title: Archery master
description: Archery Master is an interactive web-based game where players can test their archery skills against various targets and challenges. The game features realistic physics, smooth animations, and responsive controls. Players can customize their bows and arrows, and compete in different modes including single-player, multiplayer, and tournament mode.
tech: Canvas API for rendering the game
Physics engine (e.g., Matter.js) for realistic arrow movement and collisions
Web Audio API for sound effects and music
Local Storage or IndexedDB for saving player progress and game state
